title: Online Project-Based Social Learning Design: Strategies for Enhancing Student Engagement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Social Science Theories and Research Methodologies
context.additional_context: Conducted in online environments using digital devices, designed based on cases of transitioning traditional campus-based classes to online

learning_goals: Learners submit project-based assignments with over 80% timeliness using online collaboration tools.
Learners generate meaningful interaction records at least three times per week through peer feedback systems.
Learners achieve over 4 points on the A/B evaluation criteria in digital content creation projects for solving social issues.
Learners establish self-directed learning plans and complete weekly learning logs with over 90% consistency.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
